meanings.definition: a person who guides or directs a vehicle or animal
meanings.sent1: The steerers on the farm led the cows to the pasture.
meanings.sent2: The bus driver was the steerers of the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The steerers at the zoo made sure the penguins went the right way.
meanings.sent4: She was the steerers of the family, always knowing the best route to take.
meanings.sent5: The steerers of the ship skillfully navigated through the stormy seas.

meanings.definition: a device used for controlling the direction of a boat or ship
meanings.sent1: The captain adjusted the steerers to change the ship's course.
meanings.sent2: The steerers on the boat helped keep it on the right path.
meanings.sent3: The old steerers on the ship creaked as they turned.
meanings.sent4: The steerers of the boat were like a compass, guiding them home.
meanings.sent5: The shiny steerers gleamed in the sunlight, aiding navigation.
